questions.feedback: Correct! Dolphins are mammals because they are warm-blooded, have hair (though minimal), and feed milk to their babies.
questions.subject: science

questions.feedback: Excellent! Herbivores are animals that eat only plants. Examples include rabbits, deer, and elephants.
questions.subject: science

questions.feedback: Correct! Not all birds can fly. Penguins, ostriches, and emus are examples of flightless birds.
questions.subject: science

questions.feedback: Perfect! Butterflies undergo complete metamorphosis: egg → larva (caterpillar) → pupa (chrysalis) → adult butterfly.
questions.subject: science

questions.prompt: Match the animal to its classification:
questions.feedback: Great work! Understanding animal classifications helps us learn about their characteristics and habitats.
questions.subject: science
